name: Remolacha
description: La re mo la cha cha cha

scripts.build: grunt build && mkdir -p docs/js && ./node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js  -t [ stringify --extensions [.obj .svg .glsl] ]  app/js/main.js > docs/js/main.js
scripts.winbuild: grunt build && chdir docs && mkdir js && cd .. && ./node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js  -t [ stringify --extensions [.obj .svg .glsl] ]  app/js/main.js > docs/js/main.js

author: lct
